casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Timothy BLACKWELL. No. 490PA04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 14, 2006. Patricia A. Duffy, Robert C. Montgomery, Amy C. Kunstling, Assistant Attorney Generals, Michael Nifong, District Attorney, for State of NC. Marilyn G. Ozer, Chapel Hill, for Blackwell.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of October 2006 by Defendant for the Third Motion for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 14th day of December 2006."
